item.title: Global Struggle for a Plastics Treaty Agreement: Nations at an Impasse
item.dc:creator: Paul Dimtro, M.Sc.
item.description: 🌍 The fight for a global plastics treaty is heating up! Nations are grappling with tough decisions as they debate how to curb plastic pollution. With stakes this high, every choice matters for our planet's future. Will global leaders find common ground, or remain at an impasse? 🤔 #PlasticsTreaty #Sustainability #GlobalChallenge
